Review Text: We stayed here for a few hours before our early morning flight on 29 November and had a really good experience. The check-in process was smooth because the receptionist was incredibly friendly and welcoming. The only room available was the suite, but the price was still affordable. When we entered the room, we were honestly amazed by how spacious and clean it was. It had all the amenities and facilities we needed, which made our short stay very comfortable. The staff were also very helpful during both check-in and checkout. They even helped us move our luggage to the lift, which we really appreciated. The interior of the hotel was beautiful too and gave a very pleasant first impression. Unfortunately, I didnâ€™t get to take many photos because I was already tired, but I would definitely come back here next time and recommend this place to friends.

The hotel's location is brilliant, for business travelers, arriving late and leaving early the next day. The reception staff is nice and polite, and check-in is quick, something you need after a long trip. Room is clean and nice, breakfast starts early wich is very good. I thought a good massage was what my body needed now, so I ordered from their spa department, Therapist Karin came to my room, polite and professional. Her massage did wonders for a tired body, so that night I slept like a baby ğŸ˜. She spoke good English, so you could converse a bit during the treatment. I travel here often, and will of course order a massage with Karin next time too ğŸ‘

Had a great stay at the hotel, it was very clean and comfortable! Much more than I expected from an airport hotel, defensively recommend to stay here if you arrive late or fly early. The breakfast was absolutely amazing and the staff at the reception was super nice and friendly, especially Amelia, such a lovely person with a kind soul :)

Nyaman sekali stay di sini. Kamarnya bersih dan rapi. Fasilitas lengkap. Bfastnya enak2 dan menunya melimpah. Staff nya ramahÂ² dan helpfull sekali terutama mbak amel yg membantu saat cek in dan mbak okti yg melayani saat bfast. Semoga bs dipertahankan pelayanan baiknya. Great services â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸

Lobby looks clean and still new. the receptionist, Ms. Amelia and Ms. Tria are very polite and handled our check in really well. location it is inside the airport, so convenient. would highly recommend this

Itâ€™s our second time staying at this hotel, and once again, we werenâ€™t disappointed! The room is spacious, super comfortable, and the breakfast is great. Today, Tria kindly offered us an early check-in at no extra cost since we arrived around noon. After several hours of traveling, we were so grateful for her impeccable and friendly service.

Ini ke tiga kalinya saya menginap di grand anara, dari segi pelayanan nya sangat baik, kamarnya juga bersih dan wangi. Interior nya mewah dan comfy, saya juga spa dengan mba gendis, sangat baik, ramah, pijatannya merilekskan dan pegalâ€ saya juga hilang. Saya akan menjadi langganan grand anara karena sudah nyaman.

As a few others have mentioned, signage to get here could be better. The hotel is a typical business style hotel, it was clean, great shower, comfortable beds, quiet. Itâ€™s a bit of a walk to get here if at the other end of the terminal, and be sure to know there are 2 Anara hotels, one grand, one regular. The included breakfast is also highly recommended. Only complaint is, itâ€™s hard to understand the billing format with the service charges and such. Also, coffee in the room would be nice.

Hotelnya bagus pelayanannya baik. Saya pesan group dinner juga masakannya enak2. Kurangnya adalah: 1. Suara antar ruang tidak kedap suara (mungkin krn saya dapat yg bagian connecting room. Jd ckup mengganggu di malam hari kalau ada yg baru datang dan ngobrol. 2. Tidak ada amenities kapas didalam ruangan, saya request kapas tp tidak kunjung datang. 3. Waktu checkin group booking petugas kurang cekatan dan juga beberapa jenis room ada yg salah tidak sesuai request. Jadi rombongan harus menunggu. Semoga bisa diperbaiki. Terimakasih. Selain itu sudah baik. Terimakasih.

Check In , Rooms , service and Location are prime top quality. We booked a room, itâ€™s very accessible from the Airport Terminal 3. Thank you Grand Anara Airport hotel Team especially Tria. The service inspires confidence and peace for a beautiful stay.

Hotel terbaik di bandara jakarta , terletak di terminal 3 domestik jadi kl perlu ke terminal 2 harus lewat skytrain (11-15 mins) Interior nya mewah dan kamar nya sangat nyaman. Fasilitas jg lengkap ada gym , kolam renang , & sauna. Lounge nya jg asik banget sangat nyaman Breakfast variasi menu nya standard tapi rasa enak & tempatnya nyaman Plusnya lagi dgn posisi di terminal 3 , naik 1 lantai lgs ke area restoâ€ bandara

This place is a great option for a transit stopover â€” safe and reasonably priced. The location is super strategic, just a 10-minute walk to the flight check-in area. The rooms aren't super spacious, but they're cozy. The staff are friendly, especially receptionist Amelia and waitress Sila, as well as the other restaurant staff. One suggestion for improvement would be to offer more vegan options.

Nginep 1 malam utk check in pagi hari keesokan hari ini, kamar bersih, luas, gk berisik dng view gate 14, 15 serta pesawat garuda lalu lalang. Masakan utk sarapan tasty, dibantu dorong trolleynya oleh mas mas staff dari hotel hingga ke counter check in. Alhamdulillah

Hotelnya tidak mewah, tp bagian kamarnya cukup nyaman, bersih dan masih terawat. Lokasi nempel airport T3 domestik, jadi bisa tinggal jalan kaki buat cek in pesawat ataupun sekedar jajan di airport. Staff juga helpful semua (makasih jg mba amelia yg udah bantu upgrade kamar connecting). Untuk breakfast gak banyak varian, tp lumayan enak yah. Dijamin kenyang. Hanya saja kekurangannya internetnya lambat. Susah bener kalau mau streaming. Sinyal hp jg terbatas. Jd lumayan ganggu yah kalo ada keperluan penting. Kekurangan satu lagi, fasilitas fitnessnya kurang bangett. Mengecewakan sih kalo mau workout. Cuman ada treadmill, sepeda statis manual, cross trainer yg semua kualitasnya dibawah standard. Gak enak dipakenya. Kalo mau latihan beban masih ada 1 set dumble & bench. That's all. Ya overall sih good stay kalo untuk transit. Kalo untuk bbrp hari sih, bosen yah.

All goood! Sangat comfy dan pilihan yang tepat untuk menginap sebelum long flight. Room clean, service ramah, breakfast enak2 bervariasi + ada indomiee. Harga pun masih sangat affordable karena bangunannya baru ya, dan sudah include breakfast. Terima kasih kakak Tria + Amel (if iâ€™m not mistaken) yang sudah memberikan early check in pukul 13.30 karena ternyata roomnya sudah siap. Keep up the good work guys!

Frontdesk bulan September nginep nyebelin semua, November lebih nyebelin lagi. Yang udah sering nginep dimana2 bisa merasakan buruknya hospitality di Jakarta, terburuk di Anara domestik & internasional. Hotel mahal, hospitality level comberan. Ga bakal lagi bawa tamu kesini, 1.5 million rupiah for what? Breakfast nya aja standar bintang 2. Lols what a joke.

Lokasinya strategis,dan mewah dekat dengan parkiran domestic, staff hotel mba nashila sangat membantu saat saya batuk lgsg di beri air hangat untuk minum (kondisi lagi batuk), Fasilitasnya sangat luas dan nyaman. Good pertahankan ğŸ™ğŸ»ğŸ™ğŸ»
Pengalaman menginap disini luar biasa,kamar nya nyaman, dan yg paling berkesan sarapan buatan chef Tri surya juga enak, orgnya ramahh.. thankyouuu

Satu malam di hotel grand Anara sangat memuaskan,kamar bagus dan wangi lobby bagus dan luas,breakfast enak dan dibantu langsung dengan mbak okti yang sudah membantu untuk ambilkan teh kopi dan pastry lainnya Selebihnya aman dan sangat memuaskan,terimakasih mbak okti dan staff lainnya

Mas t*i*, coba kalau ada tamu bertanya ke mas-nya, sambut dengan salam, senyum, sapa! Sebagai front office bknnya hal mendasar ya itu? Walaupun bukan tamu menginap, hanya tanya tempat benar tidak disini ada event itu, pas ditanya juteknya MasyaAllah ğŸ˜ŒğŸ‘ Staff lain bagian depan juga ga da sapa senyum sama sekali Ramahnya sama tamu2 bule nya aja. Ini masukan ya, bukan hate comment, krn hotelnya bagus, loby nyaman, tempatnya enak strategis banget! Sayang kalau karyawannya seperti karyawan puskesmas ğŸ˜ŠğŸ™

Lokasi sangat strategis, berada di dalam Terminal 3 Domestik. Dari keberangkatan nomer 5, cukup turun 1 eskalator melewati hotel kapsul kemudian menuju arah parkiran namun sebelum sampai di sana, arah Hotel berada ke arah kiri (lihat papa tulisan Grand Anara). Lobby dan ruang tunggu luas. Pelayanan ramah. Check in cepat. Kamar cukup luas, bersih, ada handuk, air mineral, sikat gigi, comb, ada hair dryer, tidak ada setrika. Untuk TV menggunakan STB (jadi ada 2 remote). Makanan cukup bervariasi namun masih kalah dibanding yang tanpa Grand di Terminal 3 Internasional. Untuk kopi, tidak ada mesin brewingnya. Kurangnya di sini nih

I just visited grand Anara hotel , and I very impressed to see the rooms so clean and comfortable and the receptionist also friendly and nice. For the spa is highly recommend, although there is no massage room and massage can only be done in hotel room, but it was satisfied and amazed, I massaged with very experienced therapist and her massage was very good,she is also friendly, I forgot her name but I will never forget her amazing hands. Thank you

Fasilitas baik, Sarapan di hotel ini overall enak makanannya, dan pelayanan yang diberikan sangat luar biasa, terutama mba sarah sangat ramah meskipun restoran sedang ramai, pelayanan dan fasilitas seperti ini membuat pengalaman saya sangat menyenangkan, Terimakasih

Nyaman dan praktis untuk menginap. Kamarnya bersih, rapi, dan fasilitasnya memadai. Suasananya tenang, cocok untuk perjalanan singkat maupun transit. Staf ramah dan sigap membantu, membuat pengalaman menginap lebih nyaman dan efisien.

Amazing location in terminal 3, very convenient and this is a good looking hotel. I put only 3 stars because I couldnâ€™t sleep all night as the soundproofing was terrible (kids noisy near me). I was maybe unlucky but there was also a very bad smell in the room (272), hotel management should do something about that. Special thank you to the employees, they are very nice.

Nyaman banget. Tinggal jalan kaki ke gate yg ada di bandara.karena lokasinnya terhubung lgsg ke area airport. menu di restonya jg the best. Lezaat pas di lidah. Kamarnya luas ada bathup nya. Disediakan juga komplemen cemilan dan minuman ringan. Like somuch for this hotel. sangat banyak kemudahan saat di Bandara..

Saya nginap disini 1 malam saya bertemu mba novita yang baik membantu saya jelaskan terkait sky train karna saya orang awam Makannnya sebenernya biasa aja cuma service dari mba novita bagusğŸ¥° Kamarnya nyaman Lokasi didalam bandara jadi enak ketika perjalanan lelah nunggu transitğŸ˜

Saya baru saja menginap di Grand Anara Hotel Jakarta, dan pengalaman saya sangat memuaskan. Salah satu hal yang paling berkesan adalah pelayanan dari resepsionis bernama Tria. Sejak pertama datang, saya disambut dengan senyum ramah dan sikap profesional yang membuat proses check-in berjalan cepat dan nyaman. Tria sangat membantu dalam menjawab semua pertanyaan saya tentang fasilitas hotel dan memberikan rekomendasi tempat makan di sekitar. Sikapnya yang sopan, sabar, dan penuh perhatian benar-benar mencerminkan pelayanan kelas atas dari Grand Anara Hotel. Terima kasih untuk pengalaman menginap yang menyenangkan. Saya pasti akan kembali lagi, dan semoga bisa bertemu dengan Tria lagi di kunjungan berikutnya. Pelayanan seperti ini yang membuat tamu merasa dihargai dan betah.

Saya menginap di Hotel Grand Anara Bandara Soekarno-Hatta dan pengalaman saya sangat menyenangkan. Lokasi hotel sangat strategis, dekat dengan bandara sehingga cocok untuk transit maupun penerbangan pagi. Kamar bersih, nyaman, dan fasilitas lengkap untuk istirahat singkat sebelum melanjutkan perjalanan. Yang paling berkesan adalah pelayanan dari staf, khususnya Mbak Triya di front desk. Beliau sangat ramah, cekatan, dan benar-benar helpful sejak proses check-in hingga memberikan informasi yang saya butuhkan. Pelayanan seperti ini membuat pengalaman menginap jadi jauh lebih menyenangkan. Sangat direkomendasikan untuk yang mencari hotel nyaman dengan pelayanan terbaik di sekitar Bandara Soekarno-Hatta. ğŸ‘

Hotel yg bagus dan nyaman, lokasi strategis untuk penerbangan domestik.. breakfast cukup komplit, friendly staff,, hanya sayang ada berisik di kamar saya (mungkin suara pompa air or something else i dont know), dan di shower room ada sikat gigi tertinggal milik tamu sebelumnya ,mungkin cleaning service lupa ) but overall this is a good hotel ğŸ™‚ğŸ™ thx

The location for this hotel is very convenient cause its close to the domestic gate, due the mistake my husband made for his international flight, forced me to book another airport hotel which also airport hotel close to international departure gate the day before. Since the check-out from the 1st hotel was around 12:00, I had to check-in early at Grand Anara Airport for my next stay before my flight back home in the next morning. The receptionist staffs, Ria & Amelia, was kind and allowed me to request early check-in. My room even has the runway view (I didnâ€™t got the runway view from my 1st hotel). Very good brand new and well-managed hotel, clean, convenient and comfy.

This airport hotel was super convenient, located right inside Terminal 3, which made catching our early morning flight stress-free. The breakfast was surprisingly good, with a wide variety of options, a great way to start the day before flying. The interior design also exceeded our expectations for an airport hotel, and the room was clean, cozy, and comfortable. Check-in and check-out took a bit longer than expected, and it also took some time for our luggage to be delivered to the room. But overall, it was a pleasant and practical stay which was perfect for a transit night or early flight.

Pertama kali nginep disini biasanya yang anara lama , dsini berisik jadi semalaman aku ga bisa tdr suara dari kamar sebelah dan dari luar kedengerab jls banget dan kalo orang tutup.pintu pun keras banget kedengeran nya Sarapan ga sebanyak di anara lama

Hotelnya bagus, fasilitasnya lengkap, lokasinya strategis tinggal jalan kaki ke terminal 3 domestik, staffnya ramah dan baik. Dibantu bawain koper sampai kamar dan saat check out diambilkan troli bandara. Dapat free early check in, terima kasih Mbak Amelia.

Overall a good and well located place to spend a night if you have a long stopover in terminal 3. Unfortunately in our room (217) we kept hearing an annoying background noise the whole night. Similar to an engine vibration which was not coming from AC or bathroom vent exhaust. Needed earplugs to sleep. Pity. Breakfast is average.
Hotel yang nyaman dekat dengan keberangkatan Domestic, berada di dalam airport T3 area domestik, kamar cukup luas, nyaman, bersih dan modern

Pelayanan di Grand Anara Hotel Jakarta sangat memuaskan, terutama dari Mbak Tria di bagian resepsionis. Ramah, cepat tanggap, dan sangat membantu selama proses check-in dan selama saya menginap. Terima kasih atas pelayanannya yang luar biasa!

It is NEXT to T3 Domestic Departure building. However as lack of sign, it's little bit tricky to find though. If your flight arrive at T3 (international or domestic), just walk all the way to the end of domestic departure hall level, then down to Level 2. It's very convenient if you have early morning flight to catch up, late night arrival or delayed flight. Breakfast is huge, typical 4 stars hotel in Indonesia. Lots of option Indonesian food. Room & bathroom is quiet spacious.

pengalaman pertama menginap dihotel grand anara domestik,hotelnya sangat strategis dekat dengan counter check in garuda domestik,hotelnya bagus kamarnya bersih,nyaman dan fasilitasnya lengkap dan dari pelayanan dari staf khususnya Mas Rizki. Beliau sangat ramah dan sangat membantu saya

hotel di bandara yg cukup enak dgn fasilitas lengkap + mushola ... utk rehat sebentar utk transit ke penerbangan berikutnya ... sarapan pagi direstoran ini menyajikan menu lokal yg enak ğŸ‘ ... rekomendasi

Located near domestic departure in T3, stayed there for a night waiting for our transit flight. The service provided was good, Harby responded and helped us a lot taking care of our bags. I agree with other customers that the room needs soundproofing. I could hear new visitors entering their room and talk. Other than that, the room was clean and comfortable.

Baru pertama kali coba tinggal di hotel bandara yang bener2 letaknya di dalam bandara Letaknya di terminal 3 domestik Mulai dari lobby, kamar, fasilitas, hospitality semuanya mantap banget. Mereka juga jadi satu satunya hotel yang ada di bandara yang punya kolam renang juga loh! Overall Grand Anara cocok banget buat kalian yang terutama mau transit sebelum flight ataupun yang cape abis flight dan mau nyantai dulu Great job Grand Anara! Will definitely come back for staying before another flight

Nothing wrong with the hotel, clean, best location for transit, the staff services and food is amazing But give you one star for now, as the sign to guide traveller is not present adequately from all direction of T3 area neither from arrival, check in area, nor even from from the car park hotel lobby drop off, it might Airport authorities responsibility, but it should be quick fix, and if the hotel management can follow up definitely you deserve for 5 stars ( I am local but lets imagine for international traveler 1st time transit to this hotel with family member old & infant, with trolly of bags running around & asking to find the hotel ğŸ˜Š)

Hotelnya sangat nyaman dan pelayanan sangat baik, Massage nya juga sangat bagus pelayanan yang sangat baik dan bikin relax dan sangat amat ramah sekali mba metta dan sangat sabar , Terimakasih massagenya mba meta the best pijitanyaa ğŸ˜Š

Excellent, first impressions I love the new building interior of grand Anara hotel, staff was smiling to the guest, the food also are really Indonesian taste delicious, if I have a chance I wanna stay in here againğŸ’•

Wonderful experience greeted by the most friendly staff who are well verse in English. For those who have early flights, please request for takeaway breakfast if you already paid for it. I was able to enjoy the breakfast before boarding my plane.

Kamar (4/5) : luas, ranjang besar, ada space buat taruh bagasi di belakang pintu, ada lemari es, brankas, peralatan mandi lengkap (kirang pisau cukur saja),, cuma yang perlu disayangkan ada beberapa bercak noda di bantal dan sprei, untungnya bantal dapat 2 (video terlampir), dan fo bawah lemari es juga ada sisa obat sakit kepala yg tidak dibersihkan Layanan (5/5) : staf ramah, hotel juga termasuk lengkap ada gym room, pool, sauna, dan resto untuk makan pagi nya ok banget Suasana (5/5) : letaknya di lt 1, tepat di bawah keberangkatan donestik, mau cari makan mudah, suasana dalam hotel juga tenang, bagus untuk istirahat

I just find this hotel from my Busnies Client Singapore Airlines and Qatar Airlines so I book this hotel . I have been gave good customer vis phone and whatApp from the team member name Amelia , I wanted to spoil some one and she just treat me with passion and amazing customers services and made me so happy for that and I'll used this hotel for long term. Thank you Amelia and well done gran Anara hoyle for Make your customer happy

Saya tuh suka banget hotel ini karena strategis dan nyaman untuk menunggu terbang pagi karena lokasinya. Tapi coba deh sekali-kali yang punya hotel tidur di kamar dan pakai tab yg diâ€™matikanâ€™ di side desk nya bed. Pasti kesulitan sekali. Trus coba sekali-kali nonton Youtube atau Netflix di TV. Kalau pas lagi nggak beruntung bisa ada prompt: harus update software. Kalau pas beruntung bisa, suara TV nya agak kurengg ya padahal merknya Samsung. Nggak ngerti kenapa, ini berlaku untuk semua kamar. Selebihnya sangat OK.

Datang setelah dzuhur alhamdulillah langsung bisa early cek in tanpa ada biaya tambahan dibantu oleh staff yg ramah (tria) Hotelnya terletak di terminal 3 gate 5 turun ke bawah satu lantai, lurus terus di samping AW

Wah, pengalaman nginep di Grand Anara Hotel dalam Terminal 3 Soetta keren banget ! Lokasinya emang juara, tinggal jalan doang ke gate. Sarapannya enak dan pilihannya banyak, jadi pagi-pagi langsung semangat deh. Eh, hotel bandara ada kolam renang, gym, sama area outdoor juga? Keren banget aumpah ! Buat yang mau santai atau olahraga sebelum terbang, pas banget. Apalagi ada tempat smoking yang gampang dijangkau, jadi nggak ribet buat yang merokok. Kamarnya juga cakep, bisa langsung lihat Terminal 3 dari jendela, jadi seru banget buat nunggu penerbangan. Bakalan balik lagi sih ke ini Hotel kalau ke JKT terus..

Conveniently located in first floor (one floor below the check in/counters) of terminal 3 domestic side. You keep going to the far end (pass the capsule hotel and the connecting hallway) and you'll see A&W. The hotel is to the left of that (see the last 2 pictures). It is a bit of a walk if you're coming from international counters (about 10-15 minutes). But very convenient if you need to check in early morning.
Gratis! Semua nya aman. Breakfast nya sedap semua. Various choices of foods. Mbak Okti and all the staffs are very nice and approachable. Bisa diulang lagi ke sini.

I arrived on an international flight into terminal 3 and departing the next morning from terminal 3. The Grand Anara Hotel was perfect for my stay. I didnâ€™t even have to leave terminal 3 building. Check in was very friendly and efficient, as was my check out. The staff are all very welcoming and friendly! The rooms are very new, modern, clean and comfortable. The bed was extremely comfortable! There is a Circle K and many other convenience stores very close by. The main terminal is only a short walk and you have access to all the restaurants and cafe facilities as well. Very comfortable and convenient place to stay. Next time I am transiting in Jakarta Iâ€™ll definitely be staying at the Grand Anara Hotel! One recommendation I would suggest is to have some signage for directions to the hotel. As this is a new hotel, Iâ€™m sure this is something they are already working on. Thank you!

hotelnya nyaman fasilitas oke, staff hotelnya sangat amat ramah dan yang paling penting makanannya enak.. menu breakfast nasi goreng kemarin top bgt sampe nambah hehe.. terbaik chef suryağŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ terimakasih pelayanannya. Akan kembali lagi ke sini , karena sangat recommend

Our room was on the 2nd floor near the lifts. There was a constant humming coming from an electrical motor that made sleeping difficult. Also, the room had a dividing door to the next room, and I could hear people talking. Probably stay elsewhere next time due to the lack of soundproofing. It's a shame because the hotel is nice and new.
Pelayanan sangat luar biasa@mba Okti yang Ramah dan menemani waktu breakfast dan lunch Di resto nya
Hotel nyaman Bersih Sarapan pagi enak2 menunya Ada kolam renang Gym Recommended Ada smoking room di lobby dan area kolam renang

Hotel yang strategis di Terminal 3 Bandara Soeta. Pengalaman duty trip melibatkan disabilitas dari daerah berbeda, dan sangat terbantu karena staff hotel bersedia menjemput sejak dari keluar conveyor belt hingga ke hotel. Terbantu dengan Pak Fauzie staff hotel yang selalu berkomunikasi selama penjemputan mitra kami di terminal 1 hingga dibawa ke terminal 3. Kondisi kamar cukup luas, dan disediakan monitor touch screen sebagai pengganti pesawat telpon dan buku menu layanan. Sayangnya, justru tidak mudah diakses oleh yang punya hambatan penglihatan. Secara umum, senang bisa istirahat transit di Grand Anara.

This hotel is an ideal choice for travelers in transit. My wife and I spent a night here for a layover and our experience was nothing but awesome. The place is very clean and quiet, the room ambience is wonderful, and the staff are exceptionally welcoming. Shout out to Mbak Tria and her colleague (I can't recall her name) who have been very friendly and helpful.. Absolutely top notch!!!
Nginep d sini pas pgen umroh.. kamar cukop luas nyaman resepsionis ramah pegawai lain juga selalu nyapa.. mkanan enak

Chef yang masak telurnya ( ibu jesica ) gak niat kerja, tidak memperhatikan orderan customer, bayangin aja kami minta Telur mata sapi matang 1 aja, sampai 2 x salah, minta pertama dikasi omlet, minta kedua dikasi telur setengah matang, itu pun setelah kami selesai makan ( padahal kami duduk gak jauh dari tempat dia stanby ) , pak manager HRD tolong di fiter lagi SDM spt ini, fyi : keadaan saat itu tidak terlalu ramai. Maaf saya apa adanya komen. Terima Kasih

The hotel doesn't have a WiFi, the network is weak. I do not recommend this hotel if you are traveling for work, you won't be able to get a proper internet connection. Moreover, it's tough to find the hotel location if you go here by taxi. The staff is professional, kind and helpful, that would be the positive point.
Terimakasih utk pelayanan nya Mba Amelia & Mba Tria.. Kamarnya nyaman, luas, bersih dan wangi.. Untuk rasa makanannya jg sangat bervariatif..

hotel nya bagus dan nyaman, untuk fasilitas nya juga sangat oke,cuman dari posisi atau letak hotel nya saja yang agak membingungkan,untuk pelayanan nya sangat oke,staff staff nya pada ramah, untuk makanan enak enak,terimakasih untuk mas rafly sudah membantu saya dan always senyum,sukses selalu semuanya

I am writing this review to help other travelers staying here find the hotel. First, there are two hotels under the same brand. The Anara and the Grand Anara airport hotels are different ones in different buildings on the opposite sides of terminal 3. This one, the Grand Anara airport hotel is on the domestic side and if you are arriving from the international arrival, like we did, need to go back up to the 2nd floor, walk to the other end of (the long) terminal 3 and go down to the 1st floor, then walk out the bridge to the domestic parking building where the hotel is. If you walk out the bridge to the international parking building, youâ€™ll reach the Anara airport hotel instead. The hotel was able to provide connecting rooms for our family - one room with a king and another room with a double twin. The rooms were clean, although they did smell a little musty. The staff were very helpful. Breakfast was available for an additional cost but we didnâ€™t have it. Room service was not available. Overall a good hotel to stay for a transit, however I suggest to pick the hotel closer to your next flight because it is quite a long walk between the international and domestic side.

Kualitas kamar sangat rapih dan bersih serta pelayanannya juga memuaskan! pada saat duduk akan breakfast mba sasha langsung menawarkan coffee atau tea very helpfull, bagian ruang makan hingga bagian pengamanan memberikan kenyamanan dan keamanan. lokasi sangat point utama karena terletak tepat di terminal 3 domestik Gak perlu repot jika ada penerbangan tinggal jalan saja no regrets.

The room is wide, comfy bed, clean bedroom and bathroom. The staffs are friendly. The location is okay. It's interesting how the domestic and international has their own hotel, so it won't be that far. The breakfast was yummy. I like how every hallway is aromatic. The elevators were quick too, so I didn't have to wait long.
Hotelnya bagus, pelayanan oke banget (shoutout to mba Amelia dan mba Tria). RecommendğŸ‘ â€¦

Hotel bintang 4 dengan fasilitas bintang 5..hanya 3 menit ke gate domestik..dan 7 menit ke gate international..ada kolam renang,ruang pertemuan yang mewah,makanan yang enak,staf yang sangat ramah,bangunan yang modern dan nyaman..nga nyangka ada hotel sebagus ini di terminal 3 Soetta..sukses selalu untuk hotel Grand Anara

Thank you Grand Anara & kak Amelia ğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜Š!

This hotel sadly really didn't do it for me. Firstly, and as I've mentioned elsewhere in other hotel reviews, one thing is paramount for me with a hotel, and that is a good night's sleep. It's now 3am and still I can't sleep because of the talking from the guests in the room next door. I can't even complain to them and say they are making a noise. They're not! The walls in this hotel are paper thin. If you want a good night's sleep, then either ensure with reception that you have no one staying next door, or I'd suggest going elsewhere. Oh, and if they offer you a runway view (as I think it was called) it may sound exciting, but it turns out not what I was expecting. You're actually just looking through the arrivals/departure halls to see it. Update - it's 5am and both my wife and I are still awake thanks to the paper thin walls. The guests in the room next door are talking, albeit as a group, but due to the soundproofing in this hotel, it is impossible to sleep. I can only speculate that all the 5-star reviews are for those lucky guests who have no neighbours or who had neighbours asleep early! The breakfast is very disappointing. Bland, poor ingredients - seems like cheapest bread out, nasty pineapple jam, poor chips, and even the nasi goreng kampung was tasteless. I could go on. Signage from domestic arrivals is very iffy, as others have mentioned. It is findable with a little help, but does one really want one's hotel to be hidden. It also means that delivery people cannot find it - as other reviewers have said. I've been waiting 30 minutes in reception for a poor delivery guy trying to find the hotel. Very disappointed, indeed, with this (new! Jan 2025) hotel as it hasn't worked out for us at all.
What a wonderful hotel. Clean, beautiful, perfectly located, and the friendliest staff! Amelia at reception was incredibly helpful and such a ray of sunshine.

I had a pleasant stay at Grand Anara Domestic Hotel. The staff were very friendly, and the lobby was spacious and welcoming, a great first impression! The room was clean, with complete amenities, and one thing I really loved: the hotel smells amazing, fresh and calming throughout the building. Previously, I stayed at the international terminal hotel, which was a bit far when flying domestically. This one is much closer to the domestic terminal, and also conveniently located near restaurants and mini markets. Definitely a great option for a short, comfortable stay before a domestic flight!

We have enjoyed our stays at the Grand Anara. The hospitality team is welcoming, helpful, and professional. Tria and Abdul excel at their job and were extremely kind welcoming us back to the hotel at the end of our trip to Indonesia. The Grand Anara is clean, comfortable, conveniently attached to the CGK Jakarta airport, and features an impressive breakfast spread. Terima kasih Hotel Grand Anara!

Hotelny baru, kamar bagus ,kasur comfy, cuma suara dari luar or antar kamar terdengar jelas jd sebaikny gunakan earplugs if youâ€™re a light sleeper. Yang saya sedikit kecewa dengan hotel ini adalah saya kena charge 100K karena noda lipstick di handuk. Noda ini bukan karena sy mengusap bibir dengan handuk ya, iâ€™m not that reckless. Sialny sy habis meratakan lipstik dengan jari melihat handuk terjatuh, saya angkat lah handuk itu, agak nyesel ya dengan hobi beberes saya ini jd nempel noda lipstik dari jari ke handuk. Pas cek out dicharge lah si noda handuk 100K , berhubung buru2 ngejar pesawat yasudah sy bayar saja padahal kl ga buru2 sy bakal balik ke kamar ngucek itu handuk or even pake tisu basah pun beres kok karena tidak seNODA itu :) So lesson learned kalau nginep di sini tiati jangan sampe ada noda setitik pun di kain2 mereka karena akan kena charge.
hotel nya nyaman, pagi ini makanan nya juga enak dengan ramah tamahnya chef surya terbaik bikin mau balik lagi ...

Dateng malam2 krn delay pesawat .. pesan kamar suit tapi air panasnya gak nyala..kecewa banget krn berharap bisa mandi air panas stlh capek perjalanan flight dari jam 7 pagi-8 malam ..sudah komplain smp jam 11 malam blm nyala air panasnya ğŸ¤¢ğŸ¤¢ğŸ¤¢

The beds were new and comfy and room was clean however it was quite noisy which gave it the low star. Airport hotels need soundproofing. They also advertised certain facilities on the booking (pool, gym, restraunt) but these were not open at the time and there are other hotels in the airport with these facilities for the same price. Service was poor. We were lost finding the location, their reception did not answer our call and we tried many numbers. We had to use google reviews for directions. Check out was at 12 and our bags were packed. The reception staff knocked on our door at 11:58 before I picked up my bag to check we were leaving. It is also a decent walk from the international terminal so we had to walk a distance for dinner as the domestic terminal did not have a lot of choices. We are still waiting for a response 1 month later from management about our feedback. I would recommend staying elsewhere
Clean & comfortable room. connected to Soekarno Hatta International Airport Terminal 3. Suitable for an overnight lay over while waiting for your connecting flight.

- Located in the parking building of Terminal 3 on Level 1 - Very convenient location and all the facilities are not bad. Per this review (4 July 2025), gym and swimming pool is not yet available.

2 kali menginap bersama istri, saya sangat kagum dengan pelayanan yang sangat cepat saya menginformasi kan kepada mba syilla bahwa ada tamu yang meludah di smoking room lalu dengan cepat mba tersebut menginformasi kan kepada cleaning area nya untuk membantu membersihkan area tersebut,tamu lain yang tidak punya etika,terimakasih atas pelayanannya dan keramahannya semua all staff, see you next time
Wow better than I expected super nice and super convenient! Thank you so much to Tria and Amelia for helping me check into my room early snoothly and for being so kind!

It is a very reasonable yet nice hotel. My husband and I had 10 hour layover in CGK, and booking this hotel was the best thing we did here. Very friendly staff and direct access to the airport without leaving the airport was great. The view of the terminal is an additional to the joy of staying here! One thing to note is that their facilities like restaurant, pool, and gym weren't open the entire day we were there at normal operating hours. It may be because it is so new. We just needed a nice, clean, comfortable room so it did not bother us. We were concerned about how to get there as other people suggested. There were NO signs for this hotel. However, it is pretty easy to find it IF you know where it is at :) Just follow signs for Digital Airport Hotel. There are signs for the digital airport hotel (the capsule hotel) everywhere in the airport. When you are standing facing the digital airport hotel, look to your right to find the sign for the east parking building. Once you follow the sign, you will be at A&W within a minute or two walking from the entrance of the digital airport hotel. And TADA! You are the entrance of the hotel. Follow the picture for clarification. I hope this helped the future customers :)

Gak ada free parking, jadi siap2 bayar parkir ratusan ribu. Cek out dibilang nunggu 3 menit tapi sampai 15 menit gak dikabarin prosesnya sudah selesai atau belum. Sampai harus datangi lg resepsionis. Makanan sarapan sangat sedikit. Not recommended kalo gak terpaksa banget harus nginap di bandara
Great service at Grand Anara Hotel Bandara! Amel was very friendly and helpful. Convenient airport location. Recommended!

Ternyata sebagian besar jamaah (tamu hotel) yg kami ajak ngobrol jg mengalami kendala yg sama, berputarÂ² cari arah tanpa kejelasan

!!! HARAP PERHATIKAN UTK CHECK OUT LEWAT DARI JAM 13.00 * lewat dari jam 13.00-15.00 dikenakan charge 350.000. * lewat dari jam 13.00-18.00 dikenakan 750.000. * lewat dari jam 18.00 dikenakan tarif 1 hari. menurut saya informasi late checkout ini seharusnya wajib di infokan oleh resepsionis kepada tamu saat check in, karena ini cukup sensitif bagi tamu. resepsionis blg bahwa sudah tertulis di form tamu, tapi apakah tamu harus membaca semua S&K saat antrian check in ? dan brp persen sih yg rajin membaca semuanya ? apalagi ini di bandara, terutama bagi tamu yg sudah lelah perjalanan lama dipesawat. atau jika resepsionis tidak ingin menyampaikan perihal late check out, minimal tertulis dengan font cukup besar dan warna yg menarik perhatian, di meja resepsionis agar tamu bisa membacanya. utk resepsionis agak kaku servis nya, atau mungkin biar terlihat tegas di hadapan tamu kali ya jika terjadi perdebatan ğŸ˜…. selain resepsionis masih oke servis nya. breakfast cukup oke taste nya, dgn hanya beberapa variasi saja.

Hotel di terminal 3 domestik lt.1 sebelah restoran AW, sangat dekat dan akses mudah ke terminal 3 internasional. Kamar sangat bersih rapi dan wangi karena masih baru pelayanan staff juga sangat ramah dan membantu.

Even for a family of two kids, the twin bedroom is still quite spacious and clean. Excellent service is provided. Breakfast offers a wide variety. ideally situated, with a direct connection to the terminal. A few fast food eateries and a convenience shop are located right outside the hotel lobby. Kamar tipe twin bedroom-nya bersih dan luas, bahkan untuk keluarga yang membawa 2 anak. Pelayanan sangat memuaskan. Breakfast cukup bervariasi. Lokasi strategis, langsung terhubung ke lantai 2 terminal 3 domestik. Terdapat minimarket dan beberapa tempat makan di luar lobby.

Pengalaman menginap disini sangat memuaskan, lokasinya juga mudah ditemukan, dari parkiran gedung domestik P3, setelah pintu masuk ke arah bandara, langsung belok kanan sudah sampai, hotelnya mewah, bersih dan paling penting staff nya ramah ramah, dan aku terbantu sekali dengan staffnya Fahmi, Toyyib, dan Tria yang helpful dan ramah, kamarnya juga memuaskan, bersih, luas dan bisa lihat pesawat dari kamarnya, fasilitas kamarnya juga lengkap dan berfungsi baik, lalu hotel ini satu satunya hotel di bandara yang punya kolam renang, ada perlengkapan renang anak anak juga seperti ban pelampung dll, lalu ada gym dan ruang meeting, makanan di restaurant Rindu Rasa nya juga enak enak, aku dibantu sama staffnya Sasya buat jelasin berbagai menu pilihan yang enak enak, puas banget selama disini, sarapannya juga banyak variasinya, dan enak semua, rekomended banget hotel ini
